Text.dialogue: Heey! Have you ever tought of how magnets can help the environment,generating less polution and helping with traffic?
The humans are in a constant seek for renewable and clean energy to power up our lives and mantain a sustainable world for upcoming generations
This is a Maglev. It's like a train, but it only requires magnetic and electric force to run, reducing the amount of cars on the streets,making the air quality better
Let me show how all those magnets and electricity works, so we can build more environmental-friendly transportation around the world
